title: Design and Operation of Augmented Reality-Based Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Digital Learning Tools, Basic Software Proficiency, Healthcare/Social Service Management Experience
context.additional_context: Large-scale administrator-targeted program in a BYOD environment, emphasizing AR solution design applicable to real-world work settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of augmented reality technology and its educational applicability
Learners can design AR learning scenario prototypes by applying the six stages of the UXpedite Learning Design Model
Learners can analyze and optimize technical requirements for AR learning tools operating in BYOD environments
Learners can develop AR learning solutions to solve real-world workplace problems through project-based assessments
Learners can design metrics to evaluate the pedagogical effectiveness of AR content in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
